levels.levelDescription: Whispering Frostfalls is a treacherous land of icy snow, where hidden deep-dark holes lurk beneath the shimmering surface. The chilling winds carry whispers of ancient sorrows, warning travelers of the dangers that lie ahead.

Ethereal Shadow Caverns are filled with dark-dirt pathways that lead deeper into the heart of the frozen underground. Beware of hidden pockets of icy water that threaten to engulf any who dare to venture too close.

Atheronius' Lair is a volcanic maze of fiery lava-rock formations, where rivers of molten lava flow ominously, guarding the legendary Ethereal Shadow Walker's domain. The intense heat and suffocating fumes test the courage of the bravest heroes.
